modmenu.descriptionTranslation.shdr: ShatteredDream is a Minecraft mod focused on dimension exploration
tooltip.shdr.dream_shard_1: The merging of reality and illusion,
tooltip.shdr.dream_shard_3: blurring the boundary between real and imagined
tooltip.shdr.soul_shard_1: Fragments of the soul reveal hidden depths
tooltip.shdr.soul_shard_2: and the intricate desires of existence
tooltip.shdr.tainted_soul_shard_1: Traces left by a once-pure soul in pain, reflecting inner struggles
